page.title: 19HONDA GARAGE-STREET LANE
page.content: The {cars}from the Honda garage are {made in Japan} and sent to England. The most popular model is the 'Accord' because it is {cheap and reliable} and now people have to think about how they spend their money.At the garage there are 2 mechanics,1 apprentice,2 salesmen,1 receptionist and 1 car cleaner. The cars cost between Â£4800 and Â£10,300.The cars are now having more complicated bits on them such as air conditioning,anti-locking break systems and computers to govern the fuel consumption.Fuel {economy}is very important so most models run on 2 star petrol,are aerodynamically better and the body is lighter than those built a few years ago. Most customers change their cars every 18 months. Men prefer sober colours like silver or grey while ladies choose striking red or white.
